item.title: Error You must add your mobile phone to your Twitter profile before granting your application write capabilities
item.dc:creator: Suraj Koli
item.description:
Error : Error You must add your mobile phone to your Twitter profile before granting your application write capabilities. Please read https://support.twitter.com/articles/110250-adding-your-mobile-number-to-your-account-via-web for more information Solution : 1) Go to https://twitter.com/ 2) Edit Profile https://twitter.com/settings/profile 3) Click on Mobile tab…

The post Error You must add your mobile phone to your Twitter profile before granting your application write capabilities appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Error :

Error You must add your mobile phone to your Twitter profile before granting your application write capabilities. Please read https://support.twitter.com/articles/110250-adding-your-mobile-number-to-your-account-via-web for more information

Solution :

1) Go to https://twitter.com/

2) Edit Profile https://twitter.com/settings/profile

3) Click on Mobile tab https://twitter.com/settings/devices

4) Activate Twitter text messaging, enter your region, mobile number and select Carrier.

5) done. if not “Sorry, we don’t have a connection to your carrier yet!”

6) Don’t worry, we’re on it and will let you know once things are set up. In the meantime, use one of our long codes. Learn more. https://support.twitter.com/articles/14226-how-to-find-your-twitter-short-code-or-long-code

7) Check for your region and Carrier.

8) If your region or Carrier does not present.

9) Repeat Point 1 to 4 from your mobile phone browser.

10) Enjoy..

The post Error You must add your mobile phone to your Twitter profile before granting your application write capabilities appeared first on .
